column4: I've been messing around with Samba, and now every time i try to sudo, it says 'unable to resolve host', how do i fix this?
I had this issue the other day.. go to System/Admin/Network and unlock.. then click Hosts and add 127.0.0.1 and your user name
or actually add your desktop name.. my login is .. well lets say.. Scunizi but the machine is scunizi-desktop
should also take effect right away
